titles.title: Lord, I Deserve Thy Deepest Wrath

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord, I deserve Thy deepest wrath, ungrateful, faithless I have been; no terrors have my soul deterred, nor goodness wooed me from my sin.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: My heart is vile, my mind depraved, my flesh rebels against Thy will; I am polluted in Thy sight, yet, Lord, have mercy on me still!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Without defense to Thee I look, to Thee the only Savior fly; without a hope, without a friend, in deep distress to Thee I cry.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Speak peace to me, my sins forgive, dwell Thou within my heart, O God; the guilt and powâ€™r of sin remove, and fit me for Thy blest abode.
